00030 #ifndef _INTLIST_H
00031 #define _INTLIST_H
00032 
00033 #include "IntNode.hxx"
00034 
00035 // An ordered list of integers. List data is in ascending order.
00036 class IntList {
00037 public:
00038    IntList();                               // Constructs an empty list.
00039    IntList(const IntList& r);               // Constructs a deep copy of r.
00040    IntList& operator=(const IntList& rhs);  // Assigns a deep copy of rhs.
00041    ~IntList();                  // Deallocates list resources.
00042 
00043    void add(int x);             // Adds x into its proper position.
00044    void remove(int x);          // Removes the first copy of x, 
00045                                 //   if it exists.
00046    bool contains(int x) const;  // Is x a list item?
00047    bool isEmpty() const;        // Is the list empty?
00048 
00049 friend class IntIterator;
00050 protected:
00051    IntNode* head_;
00052 };
00053 
00054 #endif
